name: enujs-ecc
keywords: ECC, Private Key, Public Key, Signature, AES, Encryption, Decryption

scripts.build_browser: npm run build && mkdir -p dist && browserify -o dist/enujs-ecc.js -s enujs_ecc lib/index.js && sha256sum dist/enujs-ecc.js
scripts.build_browser_test: npm run build && mkdir -p dist && browserify -o dist/test.js lib/*.test.js
scripts.docs: npm run documentation -- readme src/api_common.js --section "Common API" --shallow
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build_browser && npm run test_lib && npm run docs
